title: Is Draven good this patch?
body: I really want to play {{champion:119}} with my friends because TYLER1 plays him and i wanna know if he's a valid choice right now, thanks

replies.body: i think he is brilliant at the moment check it out for yourself : https://vid.me/QQwY    http://imgur.com/a/H4d3F{{champion:119}}
they buffed his q a lot.
With the nerfs to warlords bloodlust and lethality items he's not as strong but definitely still viable
